name: Henry Nguyen
about: I'm a software engineer passionate about building accessible, pixel-perfect digital experiences. Currently studying Computer Science at UCLA with plans to pursue my Master's at USC.

My main focus is creating performant, elegant web applications that combine thoughtful design with robust engineering. I enjoy working across the full stack, from crafting polished user interfaces to architecting scalable backend systems.
When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, and collaborating with other developers to solve interesting problems.
contactMessage: I'm currently open to new opportunities and my inbox is always open. Whether you have a question, want to collaborate, or just want to say hi — feel free to reach out!
